title: Find the Equation for New Balance
text: For a principal, P, invested at an interest rate, r, for t years, the new balance, A is: $$A={Pe}^{r t}$$ when compounded continuously.

title: Subsitute the Values into Equation
text: $$A=50000$$, $$P=10000$$, $$t=17$$. $$50000=10000e^{17r}$$. Solve for r. We get $$r=\frac{\ln(5)}{17}$$ which approximately equals 0.095.
